about.heading: About
about.intro1: Welcome to the poutine lovers‚Äô reference! Here, discover, rate, and share your favorite poutines in your neighborhood or beyond.
about.intro2: From our first bite in Montreal to the farthest reaches of Quebec, we‚Äôve become true poutine enthusiasts and created this site to help you find your next culinary experience. Thank you for joining us on this delicious journey!
about.intro3: For any <0>questions</0>, <1>improvement suggestions</1>, <2>issues to report</2>, or if you just want to chat about poutine, feel free to contact us by clicking the button below.
about.metaDescription: Welcome to the poutine lovers‚Äô reference! Here, discover, rate, and share your favorite poutines in your neighborhood or beyond.
about.title: About | Poutine Mania

poutinePrice.answer: Poutine prices at {{restaurant}} vary by size and toppings. Check user reviews and photos on Poutine Mania for current pricing and menu details shared by the poutine community.
poutinePrice.question: How much does poutine cost at {{restaurant}}?

poutineReviews.answer: {{restaurant}} has {{reviews}} poutine reviews with an average rating of {{rating}}/10. Users particularly comment on the quality of fries, cheese curds, and gravy. Read detailed reviews to see what poutine lovers think!
